scripts.export: mongoexport --db therapu -c articleTypes  --out ./db/articleTypes.json && mongoexport --db therapu -c articles --out ./db/articles.json && mongoexport --db therapu -c siteData --out ./db/siteData.json && mongoexport --db therapu -c survey --out ./db/survey.json && mongoexport --db therapu -c surveyResults --out ./db/surveyResults.json && mongoexport --db therapu -c surveyTypes --out ./db/surveyTypes.json && mongoexport --db therapu -c users --out ./db/users.json
scripts.import: mongoimport --db therapu --collection articleTypes --file ./db/articleTypes.json && mongoimport --db therapu --collection articles --file ./db/articles.json && mongoimport --db therapu --collection articles --file ./db/articles.json && mongoimport --db therapu --collection siteData --file ./db/siteData.json && mongoimport --db therapu --collection survey --file ./db/survey.json && mongoimport --db therapu --collection surveyResults --file ./db/surveyResults.json && mongoimport --db therapu --collection surveyTypes --file ./db/surveyTypes.json && mongoimport --db therapu --collection users --file ./db/users.json
